snippet.title: Monster Hunter Rise: Sunbreak - Bonus Update: Primordial Malzeno
snippet.description:
It's time to end this. 

The Sunbreak story reaches its epic conclusion as you face off with the ancient elder dragon, Primordial Malzeno. 

The Bonus Update for Monster Hunter Rise: Sunbreak arrives on Nintendo Switch and Steam for free on June 8!

Monster Hunter Rise: Sunbreak is available now on Nintendo Switch and PC / Steam!
https://bit.ly/MHRiseSB

Start your journey today in Monster Hunter Rise, available now!
Nintendo Switch: https://bit.ly/MHRiseNSW
PC/Steam: https://bit.ly/MHRiseSteam

Japanese https://youtu.be/FpzbmqwAtlk
French https://youtu.be/P03meSWSkcU
Italian https://youtu.be/hXQKLU2DxO0
German https://youtu.be/wr4TboLzihg
Spanish https://youtu.be/Sf4WZT_NxZM
Russian https://youtu.be/3R_5jtVkgjY
Polish https://youtu.be/twSpkd1OKC4
Brazilian Portuguese https://youtu.be/58yKZiglcXE
Traditional Chinese https://youtu.be/kGrZVGMkB8I
Simplified Chinese https://youtu.be/bjGBPKibNus
Korean https://youtu.be/Lb49jGK-G1I

#Sunbreak #MHRise #capcom

https://discord.gg/capcom
https://www.facebook.com/monsterhunter
https://twitter.com/monsterhunter
